mapper.sql: tthq_id, djxh, tthq_lbpm, tthq_kyslrq, tthq_lcslid, tthq_lrr_dm, tthq_lrrq, tthq_pzjguuid, tthq_pzsljg_dm, tthq_pzsljglx_dm, tthq_pzsljgmc, tthq_pzzmhwjh, tthq_scjyqxq, tthq_scjyqxz, tthq_sjgsdq, tthq_sjtbsj, tthq_xgr_dm, tthq_xgrq, tthq_zzhm, tthq_zzlx_dm, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into t_tax_qypzjg (tthq_id, djxh, tthq_lbpm, tthq_kyslrq, tthq_lcslid, tthq_lrr_dm, tthq_lrrq, tthq_pzjguuid, tthq_pzsljg_dm, tthq_pzsljglx_dm, tthq_pzsljgmc, tthq_pzzmhwjh, tthq_scjyqxq, tthq_scjyqxz, tthq_sjgsdq, tthq_sjtbsj, tthq_xgr_dm, tthq_xgrq, tthq_zzhm, tthq_zzlx_dm, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime ) values (#{id}, #{djxh}, #{tthqLbpm}, #{tthqKyslrq}, #{tthqLcslid}, #{tthqLrrDm}, #{tthqLrrq}, #{tthqPzjguuid}, #{tthqPzsljgDm}, #{tthqPzsljglxDm}, #{tthqPzsljgmc}, #{tthqPzzmhwjh}, #{tthqScjyqxq}, #{tthqScjyqxz}, #{tthqSjgsdq}, #{tthqSjtbsj}, #{tthqXgrDm}, #{tthqXgrq}, #{tthqZzhm}, #{tthqZzlxDm}, #{creatorid}, #{createtime}, #{updatorid}, #{updatetime} )
mapper.update: update t_tax_qypzjg set djxh = #{djxh}, tthq_lbpm = #{tthqLbpm}, tthq_kyslrq = #{tthqKyslrq}, tthq_lcslid = #{tthqLcslid}, tthq_lrr_dm = #{tthqLrrDm}, tthq_lrrq = #{tthqLrrq}, tthq_pzjguuid = #{tthqPzjguuid}, tthq_pzsljg_dm = #{tthqPzsljgDm}, tthq_pzsljglx_dm = #{tthqPzsljglxDm}, tthq_pzsljgmc = #{tthqPzsljgmc}, tthq_pzzmhwjh = #{tthqPzzmhwjh}, tthq_scjyqxq = #{tthqScjyqxq}, tthq_scjyqxz = #{tthqScjyqxz}, tthq_sjgsdq = #{tthqSjgsdq}, tthq_sjtbsj = #{tthqSjtbsj}, tthq_xgr_dm = #{tthqXgrDm}, tthq_xgrq = #{tthqXgrq}, tthq_zzhm = #{tthqZzhm}, tthq_zzlx_dm = #{tthqZzlxDm}, creatorid = #{creatorid}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatorid = #{updatorid}, updatetime = now() where tthq_id = #{id}
